statements: UPDATE donations SET donor_name='John Doe', donation_amount=100.00 WHERE donation_id=1;
UPDATE donations SET donation_date='2021-12-31', donor_name='Jane Smith' WHERE donation_id=2;
UPDATE donations SET donor_name = 'Alice', donation_amount = 500.00 WHERE donation_id = 123;
UPDATE donations SET donation_date = '2022-08-15', donor_name = 'Bob', donation_amount = 1000.00 WHERE donation_id = 456;
UPDATE donation_records SET donation_amount = 500.00, donor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE medical_supplies SET quantity = 100, supplier = 'Medical Supplies Inc.' WHERE supply_name = 'Surgical Masks';

UPDATE donation_records
SET donation_amount = 500.00,
donation_date = '2022-08-15'
WHERE id = 101;

UPDATE medical_supplies
SET supplier = 'ABC Suppliers',
quantity = 100
WHERE supply_id = 201;
UPDATE donations SET donor_name = 'Alice', donation_amount = 100.25 WHERE donation_id = 1;
UPDATE distribution_centers SET center_capacity = 200 WHERE center_id = 3;
UPDATE donations SET donation_amount = 500.75 WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE distribution_centers SET center_capacity = 1000, center_location = 'New York' WHERE center_name = 'NYC Center';
UPDATE DonationRecords SET donation_amount = 5000.00 WHERE donor_name = 'Alice'
UPDATE MedicalSupplies SET quantity = 100, supply_type = 'Medicine' WHERE supply_name = 'Surgical Masks'
UPDATE DonationRecords SET donation_amount = 1500.00 WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE MedicalSupplies SET quantity = quantity - 10, supply_type = 'Emergency' WHERE supply_name = 'Bandages';
UPDATE donations SET donation_amount = 500.00, donated_item = 'Clothing' WHERE donor_id = 123 AND donation_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE medical_supplies SET supply_quantity = 1000 WHERE supply_id = 456;
UPDATE donations SET donation_amount = 5000.00 WHERE donor_id = 12345;
UPDATE distribution_records SET quantity_distributed = 100 WHERE distribution_id = 67890;
